attributes.action: Force Banks to stock cash Machines with £5 notes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We read that the banks are hoarding lots of freshly printed £5 notes and they will not stock Cash Machines with them. We have to make do with dog eared dirty old £5 notes. I reckon we should force banks to swap old filthy, scruffy £5 notes with new fresh ones. 

Also some people are forced to take higher value notes out of the cash machine when £5 is sufficent.

Thnaks

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
